instruction: Give a realistic example of a lifestyle that supports environmental sustainability.
output: A realistic example of a lifestyle that supports environmental sustainability is one that focuses on reducing consumption and waste, and making more sustainable choices. This could include making an effort to reduce meat consumption, eating locally produced and organic food, and composting organic waste. Other steps include reducing plastic usage, limiting consumption of imported products, utilizing public transportation and green energy sources, as well as choosing renewable products whenever possible. By engaging in these practices, individuals can make substantial progress towards a more sustainable lifestyle.
